reviewText:
This is very bad - maybe I am missing something in this but I had to give this the ONE star.
While I don't like saying "hate" this movie was poorly written & poorly shot.
I get this was probably meant to be all in spanish but I can't believe even a telenovella could be this poorly made

The acting, the dialogs, the story-line are so bad, that it could be watched as a comedy... Where do people actually talk/act like that??? It's like what one would imagine ex-convicts interact with each other...

For Amor is a bilingual movie, where you can see that love sometimes is not enough to keep a couple together. There are dreams that each person has, and sometimes one of them can make mistakes by being confused by the situation.
*Sponsored Post

A bilingual action drama catered to U.S. Latino audiences about a hard working Latino that loses his job of twenty years only to get enticed into trafficking Cocaine from Mexico to the United States with tragic results.
